meanings.definition: A type of small, elongated fish found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The blennies swam gracefully in the shallow sea.
meanings.sent2: We saw a school of blennies near the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The blennies played hide-and-seek among the coral reefs.
meanings.sent4: The blennies darted like silver arrows in the water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful blennies added life to the ocean floor.

meanings.definition: Plural form of blenny, referring to multiple fish of the same species.
meanings.sent1: Many blennies gathered around the shipwreck.
meanings.sent2: The blennies were camouflaged to blend in with the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The blennies held a meeting to discuss their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The blennies moved in unison, like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The tiny blennies formed a vibrant underwater community.
